title: Traditions & Rituals

questions.text: When it comes to creating 'our traditions', I think...
choices: I love having rituals we can count on
Some traditions are nice, but not too rigid
I prefer keeping things spontaneous
Let's see what naturally develops
Other / It depends

questions.text: For holidays and special occasions, I'd love for us to...
choices: Build traditions we repeat every year
Have some traditions but also try new things
Do something different each time
Keep it flexible and go with the flow
Other / It depends

questions.text: Little daily rituals (morning coffee, goodnight texts, etc.)...
choices: Mean everything to me - I love our routines
Are sweet but don't need to happen every single day
Should happen naturally, not as obligations
Can feel repetitive - I like variety
Other / It depends

questions.text: If we found a restaurant we love, I'd want to...
choices: Make it 'our spot' and go there regularly
Go back sometimes, but also explore new places
Try it a couple times then find new favorites
Always be discovering new spots together
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to anniversaries and milestones, I hope we...
choices: Celebrate them the same special way each time
Have some traditions but add new elements
Do something completely different each year
Acknowledge them but not make a huge deal
Other / It depends

description: Discover how you feel about creating traditions and rituals together.
